about_the_game:
Dabble in darkness and add a flair of mystery to your cities with the Anno 1800 Eldritch Pack featuring Gothic-themed ornaments and Victorian-style skins.
- Enter a world of mysticism and build a city that changes after dark, a truly haunting experience.
- The new Gothic-inspired skins add timeless elegance and a sinister touch to your hospitals and residences.
- Add a touch of the supernatural by letting menacing gargoyles and animated statues watch over your streets.
- Decorate your cities with twisted trees and use the stylish new fence system to wall off your enchanted districts.
detailed_description:
Dabble in darkness and add a flair of mystery to your cities with the Anno 1800 Eldritch Pack featuring Gothic-themed ornaments and Victorian-style skins.
- Enter a world of mysticism and build a city that changes after dark, a truly haunting experience.
- The new Gothic-inspired skins add timeless elegance and a sinister touch to your hospitals and residences.
- Add a touch of the supernatural by letting menacing gargoyles and animated statues watch over your streets.
- Decorate your cities with twisted trees and use the stylish new fence system to wall off your enchanted districts.

short_description: Dabble in darkness and add a flair of mystery to your cities with the Anno 1800 Eldritch Pack featuring over 20 Gothic-themed ornaments and Victorian-style skins.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
